name: BCH MCP Server
description: A comprehensive Bitcoin Cash (BCH) MCP server powered by mainnet-js. Provides wallet management, balance checking, sending BCH, CashTokens (genesis, minting, burning, sending), escrow contracts, QR codes, and transaction utilities.
author: nickthelegend

tools.name: wallet_create
tools.description: Create a new random BCH wallet

tools.name: wallet_from_id
tools.description: Get wallet details from a walletId

tools.name: get_balance
tools.description: Get the BCH balance of a wallet

tools.name: send
tools.description: Send BCH to one or more addresses

tools.name: send_max
tools.description: Send all available funds to an address

tools.name: get_testnet_satoshis
tools.description: Request free testnet satoshis from the faucet

tools.name: qr_address
tools.description: Generate a QR code for a BCH address
